content: easy mesh crochet bottle holder designed by meemanan materials 1 2 mm cotton macrame cord 5 ply / sport 100 g = approx 320 yard 2 crochet hook 3 5 mm us e-4 3 locking stitch markers 4 yarn needle and embroidery needle 5 scissors size ~⌀ 7 cm 3 inch x h 19 cm 7 5 inch short strap length ~30 cm 12 inch long strap length ~112 cm 40 inch gauge/inch 6-7 skill level beginner eco beverage x 1 abbreviations round pattern sts english thai 1 ch2 12 double_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch 12 magic_ring magic_ring วงก้นหอย 2 chain 2 double_crochet increase *12 times slip_stitch 24 3 chain 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet increase *12 times slip_stitch 36 chain chain โซ่ chain 3 skip 1 st double_crochet on next st chain 1 single ควักธรรมดา skip 1 st double_crochet on next st *16 times single_crochet 4-18 38 crochet คธ chain 1 double_crochet on next st chain 1 slip stitch slip_stitch into 2nd first chain double double_crochet พ1ค crochet 19 chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch 38 strap x 1 row pattern sts chain 1 single_crochet each chain on next 5 sts 1-50 5 turn fasten_off leave the yarn ~25 cm sew into the other side 5sts for the length also you can adjust the row form your body assembly 1 start from magic 2 round 4 chain 3 skip 1 3 crochet mesh ring crochet round 3 st double_crochet on next st follow the pattern 4 crochet mesh until 5 round 19 chain 1 single_crochet 6 also you can round 18 around slip_stitch then adjust the row form crochet strap row you need 7 fasten_off leave 8 sew the strap into 9 you re done the yarn ~25 cm the other side 5sts thank you copyright © 2022 meemanan all rights reserved copyright ©2022 meemanan all rights reserved this pattern is an original design by meemanan this written pattern is for personal use only please do not sell or redistribute this pattern in part or in whole you may sell the finished product but please credit meemanan as the designer email meemanandotcom@gmail com line @meemanan | @meemanan
